name: War of Power: The Last Fight
description: In 1941, shot down UFOs were found on the territory of Romania, Poland and the USSR. The captured technology of aliens helped the Allies and the Axis to strengthen their power and go far in development. Parties to the conflict are waging an aggressive war against each other, but now the outcome of the war may change at any time ...
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows  7/8/10 Processor: Intel CORE i3 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 820m DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: 64-Bit
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows  7/8/10 Processor: Intel CORE i5 Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 920mx DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space Additional Notes: 64-Bit
